SectionBody.Text: The lives of a group of individual credit union members may be insured under a policy issued to the credit union, which is deemed to be the policyholder. The premium shall be paid by the credit union insuring all of its eligible members for the amounts of insurance, not in excess of the share balance, as to each member. The policy shall be for the benefit of the share account of the member or some person or persons other than the credit union or its officials. All eligible members of a credit union may be insured.
